title: Pixar Films
text:
library(ggplot2)
library(tidytuesdayR)
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2025, week = 10)
public_response <- tuesdata$public_response


public_response |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = rotten_tomatoes, y = metacritic)) +
  geom_point(na.rm = TRUE) +
  labs(title= "Rotten Tomatoes vs. Metacritic Scores for Pixar Movies", 
       x = "Rotten Tomatos score", 
       y = "Metacritic Score")+
  theme_classic()








Source:

title: Gas Prices in the US
text:
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2025, week = 26)

weekly_gas_prices <- tuesdata$weekly_gas_prices
weekly_gas_prices <-weekly_gas_prices |> 
   mutate(year = year(ymd(date)))


weekly_gas_prices |> 
  ggplot(aes(x= year, y= price, color = fuel)) +
  geom_smooth()+
  labs(
    title = "Gas Price Trends Over Time",
    x = "Year",
    y = "Price (USD per gallon)",
    color = "Gas Type"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
